title.en: Society of Great Britain and United States

description.en: The course gives an overview of British and American political and law system, economy, education and culture.
description.et: Ülevaade Suurbritannia ja Ameerika poliitilisest- ja õigussüsteemist, majandusest, haridusest ja kultuurist.

objectives.en: to provide an overview of British and American political and law system, economy, education and culture.
objectives.et: anda ülevaade Suurbritannia ja Ameerika poliitilisest- ja õigussüsteemist, majandusest, haridusest ja kultuurist.

learning_outcomes.en: 1) has basic knowledge of American history, economy, political and legal systems, education;
learning_outcomes.et: 1) omab põhiteadmisi Ameerika ajaloost, majandusest, poliitilisest ja õigussüsteemist, haridusest;

learning_outcomes.en: 2) has basic knowledge of British history, economy, political and legal systems, education;
learning_outcomes.et: 2) omab põhiteadmisi Briti ajaloost, majandusest, poliitilisest ja õigussüsteemist, haridusest;

learning_outcomes.en: 3) can make a comparative analysis on the basis of British and American history, aspects of cultural and political life.
learning_outcomes.et: 3) oskab teha võrdleva analüüsi Briti ja Ameerika ajaloo, kultuurilise ja poliitilise elu aspektide põhjal.

independent_work.et:
Students' independent work includes readings in British and American studies for conducting comparative analysis of various aspects of British/American studies (history, economics, geography, culture and society, political systems, education, art, literature, etc) (a course completion paper)
Student's comparative analysis (a course completion paper) includes media sources' analysis  (min 10 sources) and a report on independent work with a tandem language learning partner from a partner university in the UK (British students' group in Narva College).

grade_preconditions.et: Completion of all Moodle assignments and tests

grade_evaluation.et: A summative grade of the course paper  and assignments in Moodle

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.et:
weeks 1-2       Highlights of British history (2h+3h) 
weeks 3-4      History,  Economy, Social Life : England Wales (2h+2h) 
weeks 5-6      History,  Economy, Social Life  : Scotland and Northern Ireland ( 2h+2h) 
weeks 7-8      British Institutions.  Education, family, culture, identity (2h+3h) 
weeks 9-10    American History - highlights to current events (2h) 
weeks 11-12   American political and law systems, Political Institutions  (2h+2h) 
weeks 13-14  American Geography, Economy(2h+2h) 
weeks 15-16  American Education, Cultural Life (2h+2h)
